name: Maze Quest 1: The Forest
description: Maze Quest 1: The Forest is a simple relaxing puzzle game. Play as Sylvie the Elf and find your way home through 100 forest-themed maze levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560SE DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 110 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
